```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
source("../Khang_config.R")
source("../utils.R")

df <- read_tsv(file.path(data_path, "all_peptides_preprocessed.tsv"))
df <- df[df$is_not_contamination, ]
```

```{r}
# Exclude h9C12 since because they always present in the same sample together and shared peptides will sum up the intensity and the amount. While peptides covering the Q97A position will not sum up.
df <- df[df$match_ig_type!="h9C12_LC" & df$match_ig_type!="h9C12-WT_HC" & 
           df$match_ig_type!="h9C12-Q97A_HC" & df$tool!="Casanovo",]

# Create a col for mAb input, but only based on the input amount of the ref hit of that peptide 
df$concentration <- NA
df$concentration[df$match_ig_type == "Brimab_HC" |  df$match_ig_type == "Brimab_LC"] <- df$concentration_Brimab[df$match_ig_type == "Brimab_HC" |  df$match_ig_type == "Brimab_LC"]
df$concentration[df$match_ig_type == "Umab_HC" |  df$match_ig_type == "Umab_LC"] <- df$concentration_Umab[df$match_ig_type == "Umab_HC" |  df$match_ig_type == "Umab_LC"]
df$concentration[df$match_ig_type == "PGT121_HC" |  df$match_ig_type == "PGT121_LC"] <- df$concentration_PGT121[df$match_ig_type == "PGT121_HC" |  df$match_ig_type == "PGT121_LC"]
df$concentration[df$match_ig_type == "PGDM1400_HC" |  df$match_ig_type == "PGDM1400_LC"] <- df$concentration_PGDM1400[df$match_ig_type == "PGDM1400_HC" |  df$match_ig_type == "PGDM1400_LC"]
 
df <- df[df$concentration > 0,]
df$ab <- unlist(strsplit(as.character(df$match_ig_type), "_"))[c(T, F)]

# Add information on blood/ non blood for each sample
blood_ann <- tibble(Sample = 1:70,
                blood = TRUE)
blood_ann$blood[c(36:64,66)] <- FALSE
df <- left_join(df, blood_ann, by = "Sample")

# Create a df that compare two peptides with the same sequence, protease, tool, and mAb, but different sample number in THE SAME experimental replicate
# Create 3 categories for pairs of samples: 1 for both samples with blood, 2 for both samples without blood, 3 for one sample with and the other without blood
res_ratio <- df %>%
  left_join(df, by = c("Sequence", "Protease", "tool", "match_ig_type"), relationship = "many-to-many") %>% 
  subset(Rawfilenumber.x != Rawfilenumber.y) %>% subset(run.x == run.y) %>% 
  summarise(Sequence = Sequence, 
            Protease = Protease, 
            tool = tool, 
            match_ig_type = match_ig_type,
            is_cdr3_related = is_cdr3_related.x,
            intensity1 = intensity.x, 
            intensity2 = intensity.y,
            intensity_ratio = intensity.x/intensity.y,
            concentration1 = concentration.x,
            concentration2 = concentration.y,
            conc_ratio = concentration.x/concentration.y,
            ab = ab.x,
            run1 = run.x, 
            run2 = run.y,
            blood1 = blood.x,
            blood2 = blood.y,
            blood_state = ifelse(blood1 == TRUE & blood2 == TRUE, "blood",
                          ifelse(blood1 == FALSE & blood2 == FALSE, "no blood", "mixed"))
            )

# Perform inversion in cases when sample x is lower input than sample y
idx <- res_ratio$conc_ratio < 1
res_ratio$conc_ratio[idx] <- 1/res_ratio$conc_ratio[idx]
res_ratio$intensity_ratio[idx] <- 1/res_ratio$intensity_ratio[idx]

res_ratio$conc_ratio <- factor(res_ratio$conc_ratio)
```

# Calculate the 95% CI and draw lineplots (not used)
```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
# Functions to calculate the confidence interval of the medians
StripAttr <- function(x, attr_names = NULL) 
{
    if (is.null(attr_names)) 
        attributes(x) <- NULL
    else for (a in attr_names) attr(x, which = a) <- NULL
    return(x)
}

MedianCI <- function (x, conf.level = 0.95, sides = c("two.sided", "left", 
    "right"), na.rm = FALSE, method = c("exact", "boot"), R = 999) 
{
    if (na.rm) 
        x <- na.omit(x)
    MedianCI_Binom <- function(x, conf.level = 0.95, sides = c("two.sided", 
        "left", "right"), na.rm = FALSE) {
        if (na.rm) 
            x <- na.omit(x)
        n <- length(x)
        switch(match.arg(sides), two.sided = {
            k <- qbinom(p = (1 - conf.level)/2, size = n, prob = 0.5, 
                lower.tail = TRUE)
            ci <- sort(x)[c(k, n - k + 1)]
            attr(ci, "conf.level") <- 1 - 2 * pbinom(k - 1, size = n, 
                prob = 0.5)
        }, left = {
            k <- qbinom(p = (1 - conf.level), size = n, prob = 0.5, 
                lower.tail = TRUE)
            ci <- c(sort(x)[k], Inf)
            attr(ci, "conf.level") <- 1 - pbinom(k - 1, size = n, 
                prob = 0.5)
        }, right = {
            k <- qbinom(p = conf.level, size = n, prob = 0.5, 
                lower.tail = TRUE)
            ci <- c(-Inf, sort(x)[k])
            attr(ci, "conf.level") <- pbinom(k, size = n, prob = 0.5)
        })
        if (identical(StripAttr(ci), NA_real_)) {
            ci <- c(-Inf, Inf)
            attr(ci, "conf.level") <- 1
        }
        return(ci)
    }
    sides <- match.arg(sides, choices = c("two.sided", "left", 
        "right"), several.ok = FALSE)
    method <- match.arg(arg = method, choices = c("exact", "boot"))
    switch(method, exact = {
        r <- MedianCI_Binom(x, conf.level = conf.level, sides = sides)
    }, boot = {
        if (sides != "two.sided") conf.level <- 1 - 2 * (1 - 
            conf.level)
        boot.med <- boot(x, function(x, d) median(x[d], na.rm = na.rm), 
            R = R)
        r <- boot.ci(boot.med, conf = conf.level, type = "basic")[[4]][4:5]
    })
    med <- median(x, na.rm = na.rm)
    if (is.na(med)) {
        res <- rep(NA, 3)
    }
    else {
        res <- c(median = med, r)
        if (method == "exact") 
            attr(res, "conf.level") <- attr(r, "conf.level")
    }
    names(res) <- c("median", "lwr.ci", "upr.ci")
    if (sides == "left") 
        res[3] <- Inf
    else if (sides == "right") 
        res[2] <- -Inf
    return(res)
}
```

# One-sample wilcox test of median coverage vs expected median

```{r}
wc_1_run1 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "1") %>% filter(run1 == "run1") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 1, p.adjust.method = "none")
wc_10_run1 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "10") %>% filter(run1 == "run1") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 10, p.adjust.method = "none")
wc_100_run1 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "100") %>% filter(run1 == "run1") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 100, p.adjust.method = "none")
wc_1000_run1 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "1000") %>% filter(run1 == "run1") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 1000, p.adjust.method = "none")

wc_run1 <- rbind(wc_1_run1, wc_10_run1, wc_100_run1, wc_1000_run1)
wc_run1$p.adj <- p.adjust(wc_run1$p, method = "bonferroni")

wc_1_run2 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "1") %>% filter(run1 == "run2") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 1, p.adjust.method = "none")
wc_10_run2 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "10") %>% filter(run1 == "run2") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 10, p.adjust.method = "none")
wc_100_run2 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "100") %>% filter(run1 == "run2") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 100, p.adjust.method = "none")
wc_1000_run2 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "1000") %>% filter(run1 == "run2") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 1000, p.adjust.method = "none")

wc_run2 <- rbind(wc_1_run2, wc_10_run2, wc_100_run2, wc_1000_run2)
wc_run2$p.adj <- p.adjust(wc_run2$p, method = "bonferroni")

wc_1_run3 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "1") %>% filter(run1 == "run3") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 1, p.adjust.method = "none")
wc_10_run3 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "10") %>% filter(run1 == "run3") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 10, p.adjust.method = "none")
wc_100_run3 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "100") %>% filter(run1 == "run3") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 100, p.adjust.method = "none")
wc_1000_run3 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "1000") %>% filter(run1 == "run3") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 1000, p.adjust.method = "none")

wc_run3 <- rbind(wc_1_run3, wc_10_run3, wc_100_run3, wc_1000_run3)
wc_run3$p.adj <- p.adjust(wc_run3$p, method = "bonferroni")

wc_1_run4 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "1") %>% filter(run1 == "run4") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 1, p.adjust.method = "none")
wc_10_run4 <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(conc_ratio == "10") %>% filter(run1 == "run4") %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, conc_ratio, run1) %>% wilcox_test(intensity_ratio~1, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 10, p.adjust.method = "none")

wc_all <- rbind(wc_run1, wc_run2, wc_run3, wc_run4)

wc_blood <- wc_all %>% filter(blood_state == "blood")
wc_blood$p.signif <- ifelse(wc_blood$p.adj > 0.05, "ns",
                            ifelse(wc_blood$p.adj > 0.01, "*",
                            ifelse(wc_blood$p.adj > 0.001, "**",
                           "***")))

# Auto add coordinates for plotting
wc_blood <- wc_blood %>% add_y_position(fun = "max", scales = "fixed")
wc_blood$y.position <- 10000
wc_blood$group2 <- wc_blood$conc_ratio

wc_noblood <- wc_all %>% filter(blood_state == "no blood")
wc_noblood$p.signif <- ifelse(wc_noblood$p.adj > 0.05, "ns",
                            ifelse(wc_noblood$p.adj > 0.01, "*",
                            ifelse(wc_noblood$p.adj > 0.001, "**",
```

```{r}
kruskal_list <- map(res_ratio_hc_group, function(x) x %>% group_by(blood_state, match_ig_type, Protease, run1) %>% safe_kruskal_test(intensity_ratio~conc_ratio))
```

# Calculate root median square error (skip over sections with only one conc ratio available)
```{r}
# Create safe version of functions to return NA when encountering errors
safe_lm <- possibly(lm, otherwise = NA)
safe_mean <- possibly(mean, otherwise = NA)
safe_sqrt <- possibly(sqrt, otherwise = NA)

# For samples with blood
# Split the ratios into facet groups
res_ratio_hc_blood_group <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(blood_state == "blood") %>% group_by(match_ig_type, Protease, blood_state, run1) %>% group_split()
# Create a linear model fitting the data points
lm_blood <- map(res_ratio_hc_blood_group, function(x) safe_lm(intensity_ratio~conc_ratio, x))
# Calculate the RMSD of each function
rmse_blood <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(blood_state == "blood") %>% group_by(match_ig_type, Protease, blood_state, run1) %>% group_keys()
rmse_blood$rmse <- unlist(map(lm_blood, function(x) safe_sqrt(safe_mean(x$residuals^2))))

# For samples with noblood
# Split the ratios into facet groups
res_ratio_hc_noblood_group <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(blood_state == "no blood") %>% group_by(match_ig_type, Protease, blood_state, run1) %>% group_split()
# Create a linear model fitting the data points
lm_noblood <- map(res_ratio_hc_noblood_group, function(x) safe_lm(intensity_ratio~conc_ratio, x))
# Calculate the RMSD of each function
rmse_noblood <- res_ratio_hc %>% filter(blood_state == "no blood") %>% group_by(match_ig_type, Protease, blood_state, run1) %>% group_keys()
rmse_noblood$rmse <- unlist(map(lm_noblood, function(x) safe_sqrt(safe_mean(x$residuals^2))))
```


# SIR of all samples by presence of blood in each sample pair: non-blood or blood
```{r fig.height=8, fig.width=12}
ggplot(res_ratio_hc %>% filter(blood_state == "blood"), aes(x = factor(conc_ratio), y = intensity_ratio)) +
  #geom_violin(aes(color = run1), width = 0.9, lwd = 0.3, outlier.shape = NA) +
  geom_point(aes(color = run1), shape = 21, size = 0.1, stroke = 0.05, position = position_jitterdodge()) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(color = run1), width = 0.5, lwd = 0.3, outlier.shape = NA) +
  stat_pvalue_manual(data = wc_blood, hide.ns = TRUE, label = "p.signif", label.size = 3, remove.bracket = TRUE) +
  #geom_text(data = rmse_blood, aes(x = 2.5, y = 40000), label = paste0("RMSD ",round(rmse_blood$rmse,2)), size = 2) +
  scale_y_log10(breaks = 10^(-3:4), labels = c(0.001, 0.01, 0.1, 1, 10, 100, 1000, 10000)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept=1, linetype="dotted", color = "#909090") +
  geom_hline(yintercept=10, linetype="dotted", color = "#909090") +
  geom_hline(yintercept=100, linetype="dotted", color = "#909090") +
  geom_hline(yintercept=1000, linetype="dotted", color = "#909090") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#48cae4", "#0096c7", "#0077B6", "#03045E")) +
  geom_text(data = res_ratio_hc_med_blood, aes(x = factor(conc_ratio), y = 0.0001, label = round(sir_med_vdj,1), color = run1), size = 2) +
  facet_grid(factor(match_ig_type, levels = HC_names) ~ factor(Protease, levels = c("Tryp", "Ct", "Ct+Tryp")) + run1) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(legend.position = "none", axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90), 
        strip.text.x = element_blank(), strip.text.y = element_blank()
        ) +
  labs(x = "mAb input ratio", y = "MS signal intensity ratio")

ggsave("./figures/sir_blood.png", height = 8, width = 12, dpi = 600)
```

```{r fig.height=10, fig.width=14}
  geom_line(aes(x = as.numeric(conc_ratio), y = med), position = pd) +
  geom_point(position = pd) +
  facet_grid(factor(match_ig_type, levels = HC_names) ~ Protease + run1) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 1, linetype = "dotted", color = "#909090") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 10, linetype = "dotted", color = "#909090") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 100, linetype = "dotted", color = "#909090") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 1000, linetype = "dotted", color = "#909090") +
  geom_text(aes(x = conc_ratio, y = lwr.ci, label = round(lwr.ci,1), color = run1), size = 2, vjust = 1.5, position = pd) +
  geom_text(aes(x = conc_ratio, y = upr.ci, label = round(upr.ci,1), color = run1), size = 2, vjust = -0.5, position = pd) +
  #scale_y_continuous(breaks=-2:4) +
  scale_x_discrete(labels = c("1:1", "10:1", "100:1", "1000:1"), drop = FALSE) +
  scale_y_log10(breaks = 10^(-3:4), labels = c(0.001, 0.01, 0.1, 1, 10, 100, 1000, 10000)) +
  labs(x = "mAb input ratio", y = "MS signal intensity ratio") +
  #scale_color_manual(values = c("#DE4328", "#DE9E28","#000000")) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(legend.position = "none", axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 0.95),
        #strip.text.y = element_blank()
        )
```
